class.name: VisualShaderNodeIntFunc
class.brief_description: A scalar integer function to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Accept an integer scalar ([code]x[/code]) to the input port and transform it according to [member function].

members.member: A function to be applied to the scalar. See [enum Function] for options.

constants.constant: Returns the absolute value of the parameter. Translates to [code]abs(x)[/code] in the Godot Shader Language.
Constrains a parameter between [code]min[/code] and [code]max[/code]. Translates to [code]clamp(x, min, max)[/code] in the Godot Shader Language.
Extracts the sign of the parameter. Translates to [code]sign(x)[/code] in the Godot Shader Language.
